mn11:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava savatthiyam viharati jetavane anathapindikassa arame.
mn11:2.1: “Idheva, bhikkhave, samano, idha dutiyo samano, idha tatiyo samano, idha catuttho samano;
mn11:3.1: Thanam kho panetam, bhikkhave, vijjati yam annatitthiya paribbajaka evam vadeyyum:
mn11:3.2: ‘ko panayasmantanam assaso, kim balam, yena tumhe ayasmanto evam vadetha—
mn11:3.3: idheva samano, idha dutiyo samano, idha tatiyo samano, idha catuttho samano;
mn11:3.5: Evamvadino, bhikkhave, annatitthiya paribbajaka evamassu vacaniya:
mn11:3.6: ‘atthi kho no, avuso, tena bhagavata janata passata arahata sammasambuddhena cattaro dhamma akkhata ye mayam attani sampassamana evam vadema—
mn11:3.7: idheva samano, idha dutiyo samano, idha tatiyo samano, idha catuttho samano;
mn11:3.10: Atthi kho no, avuso, satthari pasado, atthi dhamme pasado, atthi silesu paripurakarita;
mn11:3.13: Ime kho no, avuso, tena bhagavata janata passata arahata sammasambuddhena cattaro dhamma akkhata ye mayam attani sampassamana evam vadema—
mn11:3.14: idheva samano, idha dutiyo samano, idha tatiyo samano, idha catuttho samano;
mn11:4.1: Thanam kho panetam, bhikkhave, vijjati yam annatitthiya paribbajaka evam vadeyyum:
mn11:4.2: ‘amhakampi kho, avuso, atthi satthari pasado yo amhakam sattha, amhakampi atthi dhamme pasado yo amhakam dhammo, mayampi silesu paripurakarino yani amhakam silani,
mn11:4.5: Idha no, avuso, ko viseso ko adhippayaso kim nanakaranam yadidam tumhakanceva amhakanca’ti?
mn11:5.1: Evamvadino, bhikkhave, annatitthiya paribbajaka evamassu vacaniya:
mn11:5.2: ‘kim panavuso, eka nittha, udahu puthu nittha’ti?
mn11:5.3: Samma byakaramana, bhikkhave, annatitthiya paribbajaka evam byakareyyum:
mn11:5.6: Samma byakaramana, bhikkhave, annatitthiya paribbajaka evam byakareyyum:
mn11:5.7: ‘vitaragassavuso, sa nittha, na sa nittha saragassa’ti.
mn11:5.9: Samma byakaramana, bhikkhave, annatitthiya paribbajaka evam byakareyyum:
mn11:5.10: ‘vitadosassavuso, sa nittha, na sa nittha sadosassa’ti.
mn11:5.12: Samma byakaramana, bhikkhave, annatitthiya paribbajaka evam byakareyyum:
mn11:5.13: ‘vitamohassavuso, sa nittha, na sa nittha samohassa’ti.
mn11:5.15: Samma byakaramana, bhikkhave, annatitthiya paribbajaka evam byakareyyum:
mn11:5.16: ‘vitatanhassavuso, sa nittha, na sa nittha satanhassa’ti.
mn11:5.18: Samma byakaramana, bhikkhave, annatitthiya paribbajaka evam byakareyyum:
mn11:5.19: ‘anupadanassavuso, sa nittha, na sa nittha saupadanassa’ti.
mn11:5.21: Samma byakaramana, bhikkhave, annatitthiya paribbajaka evam byakareyyum:
mn11:5.22: ‘viddasuno, avuso, sa nittha, na sa nittha aviddasuno’ti.
mn11:5.24: Samma byakaramana, bhikkhave, annatitthiya paribbajaka evam byakareyyum:
mn11:5.25: ‘ananuruddhaappativiruddhassavuso, sa nittha, na sa nittha anuruddhappativiruddhassa’ti.
mn11:5.26: ‘Sa panavuso, nittha papancaramassa papancaratino udahu nippapancaramassa nippapancaratino’ti?
mn11:5.27: Samma byakaramana, bhikkhave, annatitthiya paribbajaka evam byakareyyum:
mn11:5.28: ‘nippapancaramassavuso, sa nittha nippapancaratino, na sa nittha papancaramassa papancaratino’ti.
mn11:6.3: Ye hi keci, bhikkhave, samana va brahmana va bhavaditthim allina bhavaditthim upagata bhavaditthim ajjhosita, vibhavaditthiya te pativiruddha.
mn11:6.4: Ye hi keci, bhikkhave, samana va brahmana va vibhavaditthim allina vibhavaditthim upagata vibhavaditthim ajjhosita, bhavaditthiya te pativiruddha.
mn11:7.1: Ye hi keci, bhikkhave, samana va brahmana va imasam dvinnam ditthinam samudayanca atthangamanca assadanca adinavanca nissarananca yathabhutam nappajananti, ‘te saraga te sadosa te samoha te satanha te saupadana te aviddasuno te anuruddhappativiruddha te papancarama papancaratino;
mn11:7.2: te na parimuccanti jatiya jaraya maranena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upayasehi;
mn11:8.1: Ye ca kho keci, bhikkhave, samana va brahmana va imasam dvinnam ditthinam samudayanca atthangamanca assadanca adinavanca nissarananca yathabhutam pajananti, ‘te vitaraga te vitadosa te vitamoha te vitatanha te anupadana te viddasuno te ananuruddhaappativiruddha te nippapancarama nippapancaratino;
mn11:8.2: te parimuccanti jatiya jaraya maranena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upayasehi;
mn11:10.1: Santi, bhikkhave, eke samanabrahmana sabbupadanaparinnavada patijanamana.
mn11:10.3: kamupadanassa parinnam pannapenti, na ditthupadanassa parinnam pannapenti, na silabbatupadanassa parinnam pannapenti, na attavadupadanassa parinnam pannapenti.
mn11:10.5: Imani hi te bhonto samanabrahmana tini thanani yathabhutam nappajananti.
mn11:10.6: Tasma te bhonto samanabrahmana sabbupadanaparinnavada patijanamana;
mn11:10.8: kamupadanassa parinnam pannapenti, na ditthupadanassa parinnam pannapenti, na silabbatupadanassa parinnam pannapenti, na attavadupadanassa parinnam pannapenti.
mn11:11.1: Santi, bhikkhave, eke samanabrahmana sabbupadanaparinnavada patijanamana.
mn11:11.3: kamupadanassa parinnam pannapenti, ditthupadanassa parinnam pannapenti, na silabbatupadanassa parinnam pannapenti, na attavadupadanassa parinnam pannapenti.
mn11:11.5: Imani hi te bhonto samanabrahmana dve thanani yathabhutam nappajananti.
mn11:11.6: Tasma te bhonto samanabrahmana sabbupadanaparinnavada patijanamana;
mn11:11.8: kamupadanassa parinnam pannapenti, ditthupadanassa parinnam pannapenti, na silabbatupadanassa parinnam pannapenti, na attavadupadanassa parinnam pannapenti.
mn11:12.1: Santi, bhikkhave, eke samanabrahmana sabbupadanaparinnavada patijanamana.
mn11:12.3: kamupadanassa parinnam pannapenti, ditthupadanassa parinnam pannapenti, silabbatupadanassa parinnam pannapenti, na attavadupadanassa parinnam pannapenti.
mn11:12.5: Imanhi te bhonto samanabrahmana ekam thanam yathabhutam nappajananti.
mn11:12.6: Tasma te bhonto samanabrahmana sabbupadanaparinnavada patijanamana;
mn11:12.8: kamupadanassa parinnam pannapenti, ditthupadanassa parinnam pannapenti, silabbatupadanassa parinnam pannapenti, na attavadupadanassa parinnam pannapenti.
mn11:13.1: Evarupe kho, bhikkhave, dhammavinaye yo satthari pasado so na sammaggato akkhayati;
mn11:13.2: yo dhamme pasado so na sammaggato akkhayati;
mn11:13.3: ya silesu paripurakarita sa na sammaggata akkhayati;
mn11:13.4: ya sahadhammikesu piyamanapata sa na sammaggata akkhayati.
mn11:13.6: Evanhetam, bhikkhave, hoti yatha tam durakkhate dhammavinaye duppavedite aniyyanike anupasamasamvattanike asammasambuddhappavedite.
mn11:14.1: Tathagato ca kho, bhikkhave, araham sammasambuddho sabbupadanaparinnavado patijanamano samma sabbupadanaparinnam pannapeti—
mn11:14.2: kamupadanassa parinnam pannapeti, ditthupadanassa parinnam pannapeti, silabbatupadanassa parinnam pannapeti, attavadupadanassa parinnam pannapeti.
mn11:15.1: Evarupe kho, bhikkhave, dhammavinaye yo satthari pasado so sammaggato akkhayati;
mn11:15.2: yo dhamme pasado so sammaggato akkhayati;
mn11:15.3: ya silesu paripurakarita sa sammaggata akkhayati;
mn11:15.4: ya sahadhammikesu piyamanapata sa sammaggata akkhayati.
mn11:15.6: Evanhetam, bhikkhave, hoti yatha tam svakkhate dhammavinaye suppavedite niyyanike upasamasamvattanike sammasambuddhappavedite.
mn11:16.1: Ime ca, bhikkhave, cattaro upadana. Kimnidana kimsamudaya kimjatika kimpabhava?
mn11:16.2: Ime cattaro upadana tanhanidana tanhasamudaya tanhajatika tanhapabhava.
mn11:16.3: Tanha cayam, bhikkhave, kimnidana kimsamudaya kimjatika kimpabhava?
mn11:16.5: Vedana cayam, bhikkhave, kimnidana kimsamudaya kimjatika kimpabhava?
mn11:16.7: Phasso cayam, bhikkhave, kimnidano kimsamudayo kimjatiko kimpabhavo?
mn11:16.9: Salayatanancidam, bhikkhave, kimnidanam kimsamudayam kimjatikam kimpabhavam?
mn11:16.11: Namarupancidam, bhikkhave, kimnidanam kimsamudayam kimjatikam kimpabhavam?
mn11:16.13: Vinnanancidam, bhikkhave, kimnidanam kimsamudayam kimjatikam kimpabhavam?
mn11:16.15: Sankhara cime, bhikkhave, kimnidana kimsamudaya kimjatika kimpabhava?
mn11:17.1: Yato ca kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno avijja pahina hoti vijja uppanna, so avijjaviraga vijjuppada neva kamupadanam upadiyati, na ditthupadanam upadiyati, na silabbatupadanam upadiyati, na attavadupadanam upadiyati.
mn11:17.2: Anupadiyam na paritassati, aparitassam paccattanneva parinibbayati.
mn11:17.3: ‘Khina jati, vusitam brahmacariyam, katam karaniyam, naparam itthattaya’ti pajanati”ti.
mn11:17.5: Attamana te bhikkhu bhagavato bhasitam abhinandunti.
